name: Software Solutions Group
description:
Based in Buffalo, New York, Software Solutions Group, Inc. was founded in 1996. We are a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner solely focused on the Sale, Implementation and Support of Microsoft Dynamics (formerly known as Microsoft Business Solutions) products. As such, we are authorized by Microsoft as Value-Added Resellers.

Our mission is to promote the success of small and midsize companies in the rapidly changing and increasingly complex business environment. We understand the issues and we help clients to meet their tough business challenges.
We do this by tailoring appropriate solutions to a client's unique requirements, keeping in mind that no solution is complete unless it meets a company's current and future needs. To us, success is based upon two principles: implementing solutions efficiently and delivering the most responsive ongoing support possible.
